entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
